name: Rooms_new
description:
A fire in Apartment A took three lives, and for some reason, their spirits were trapped in their rooms. Unfortunately, you were chosen and brought to this apartment by the spirits. In order to escape each room, you need to look for a hidden key. Besides, try to find and collect spirit-possessed objects to fulfill the spirits’ wishes of reincarnation.
